thread.section_title: Right Channel Radios Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Right Channel Radios | www.rightchannelradios.com
thread.title: timothy stanko
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by timothy stanko

author: timothy stanko
title: timothy stanko
text: I made a purchase and received prompt response that it was ordered. The items ordered were received when I was told. And the problem with the order was promptly corrected. I have recommended Right Channel Radio to members of my Jeep and Tacoma clubs.
